(Translated by Google)
Unfortunately, I expected the barber's management to be more professional each time I got a haircut at a different price, even though I was getting a haircut without any offer or discount.

Update:

Thank you for your interest in investigating the issue and working to resolve it.

Just to clarify:
* The barber was rated 5 stars on my first visit, and I praised the service provided.

*The point of contention is the additional services added during the haircut, which are priced differently each time.

Thank you and appreciate your interest.
